traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: Clapperclaw doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Stuffing
entries: Clapperclaw stuffs straw or other dead plant matter into itself and regains {@dice 2d4 + 2} hit points. Roll a {@dice d6}; on a 1 or 2, Clapperclaw runs out of stuffing and must spend 8 hours foraging for more before it can use this action again.
